lexUnit.name: footwear.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: shoes, boots, and other coverings for the feet

sentence.text: Inter is a name synonymous with functional , practical footwear for the leisure sports market .
Water stained his shoulders , shone on his footwear , stood in drops on the furry ribs of the socks between his breeches and his boots .

Like most people who knew Joyce well , she had been filled with trepidation at the prospect of seeing someone trying on Joyce 's inimitable footwear .

Be sure to wear the correct footwear to prevent injuries to your feet , legs and back , not only because they can be acutely painful but because such injuries can take months to mend .
